definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be dispersed, scattered (NH = BH; perh. akin to Ar. fad.=a break asunder, scatter);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יׇפוּחוּ]] Ps 68:2, [[יׇפֻחוּ]] Ez Eze 48:16 +; 3 fpl. [[וַתְּפוּחֶינׇה]] Ez Eze 34:5 +, [[וּתְפוּחֶינׇה]] Zec 13:7, etc.; Imv. mpl. [[פֻּחוּ]] 1Sa 14:34; Pt. pass. pl. sf. [[פּוּחַי]] Zep 3:10 (v. infr.);—be dispersed, disperse, [[בָּעָם]] 1Sa 14:34; be scattered, of enemies 1Sa 11:11, Nu 10:35, Ps 68:2; of Isr. (among nations) under fig. of flock Ez Eze 34:5, Eze 34:5, Zec 13:7; [[בַּת־פּוּחַי]] Zep 3:10 is prob. crpt., and v:Zep 3:9, v:Zep 3:10 gloss v. Schwally:ZAW x (1890), 203 Now Da; of besieging army 2Sa 20:22 ([[מֵעַל הָעִיר]]); people from ([[מִן]]) possessions Ez Eze 46:18; men (from Babel) Ge 11:4 ([[עַל]] loc.).

be scattered, of army 2Ki 25:5 ([[מֵעַל]] pers.) = Je 52:8, 1Ki 22:17 ([[אֶל]] loc.) = 2Ch 18:16 ([[עַל]]), cf. Je 40:15 (abs.); of dispersed Isr. c. [[ב]] loc. Ez Eze 11:17, Eze 20:34, Eze 20:41, Eze 28:25, as flock Je 10:21, Ez Eze 34:6 ([[עַל]] loc.), v:Eze 34:12 ([[שָׁם]]); Egyptians Eze 29:13 ([[שָׁמָּה]]); of battle scattered over country by defeat 2Sa 18:8.
be spread abroad, of peoples Ge 10:18.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. consec. [[וְהֵפִיץ]] De 4:27 +, 1 s. consec. [[וַהֲפִיחוֹתִי]] Ez Eze 22:15, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇפִיץ]] Job 37:11, [[וַיׇּ֫פֶץ]] Ge 11:8 +, etc.; Imv. ms. [[הָפֵץ]] Job 40:11; Inf. cstr. [[לְהָפִיץ]] Ez Eze 20:23, etc.;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: c. acc. pers. Ge 11:8, Ge 11:9 ([[עַל]] loc.), Is 41:16, Hb Hab 3:14; c. [[ב]] Ge 49:7; Isr. among ([[ב]]) nations De 4:27, De 28:64, Je 9:15, Ez Eze 11:16, Eze 12:15, Eze 20:23, Eze 22:15, Eze 36:19, Ne 1:8; c. ([[ה]])[[שׁמ]] De 30:3, Je 30:11; c. [[אֶל]] loc. Ez Eze 34:21; abs. Je 13:24, Je 18:17, under fig. of flock Je 23:1, Je 23:2; Gr. rds. [[אֲפִיחֵם]] also De 32:26 (v. [[[פאה]]]); Egyptians (c. [[ב]]) Ez Eze 29:12, Eze 30:23, Eze 30:26; inhab. of earth Is 24:1.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: c. acc. rei, arrows (fig. for lightnings) 2Sa 22:15 = Ps 18:15, Ps 144:6; cloud Job 37:11; [[הָפֵץ עַבְרוֹת אַפְֶָּ]] Job 40:11 (i.e. lightnings ?); seed Is 28:25.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[וֶהֱפִיחֻהוּ]] Job 18:11 and drive him (si vera 1., vid. conj. in Bu).
intrans., scatter, c. [[ב]] loc. Ex 5:12, c. [[מֵעַל]] pers. 1Sa 13:8; of wind Job 38:24 ([[עַל]] loc.).
